actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to establish a grant program to provide employment training and placement services to individuals released from local, State, or Federal correctional facilities.

summary.text: Ex-Offender Employment Assistance Act - Directs the Secretary of Labor, acting through the Employment and Training Administration, to establish a grant program to provide financial assistance to private, nonprofit organizations which offer approved employment training or placement services to formerly incarcerated individuals.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Labor to establish a grant program to provide employment training and placement services to individuals released from local, State, or Federal correctional facilities.
